inputs.buttonStructure: The Locate button is a Material button (<button mat-button>) with classes: 'flex-row flex-layout-center getit-locate-button toggle-panel mdc-button mat-mdc-button mat-primary mat-mdc-button-base'. It contains a mat-icon with an SVG location pin icon followed by a span with text 'Locate'. The button has an aria-label that includes the sublibrary, call number, and availability info.
